page.title: 10Shopping 1985
page.content: For reasons of economy and convenience food,domestic and cosmetic, cleaning materials are mainly purchased at Supermarkets in Stratford and Leamington Spa. Most people have transport, so possibly a whole weeks shopping is undertaken at one trip, with reliance on frozen foods to cope with the latter part of the week. Day to day purchaes and newspapers can be bought in the local Bearley village shop, which also has a post office and its here that the retired population of the village can colect their pension. Results of a questionaire showed that 86% shopped in supermarkets, only 14% relied on the village shop for a large proportion of their weekly shopping. Clothes, household commodities and leisure items are purchased at Departmental stores at Stratford which
